item.title: How to Use the Rectangle Tool in Inkscape
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Insert a Rectangle: With Mouse With Keyboard How to Resize a Rectangle How to Edit the Rectangle Shape No time to scroll down? Click through this presentation tutorial: See a with a tutorial video: How to Insert a Rectangle With Mouse Step 1: First click the Rectangle tool. Step 2: Click and drag the mouse on the canvas to create a rectangle. How to Insert a Rectangle With Keyboard Step 1: On the keyboard press R.
